Pre-Game Insights: Australia will lock horns against the West Indies in the T20I format when the teams meet on February 9.
Aussies will be led by the versatile all-rounder Mitchell Marsh in the T20 series.
The men from the Caribbean are seventh in the ICC men's T20I rankings.
West Indies hold a slight edge over the Aussies in the T20Is. Of the 19 matches played, West Indies have won 10 whereas the Aussies have won nine.
Miscellaneous Highlights: All three Australia vs West Indies T20I matches will be broadcast on Star Sports 2, Star Star Sports 1 Hindi and their respective HD channels in India.
Disney+ Hotstar will be streaming Australia vs West Indies, T20I Series, live, online.
Others: The 1st T20I between Australia and the West Indies is scheduled to be played on February 9, 2024, Friday, at 1:30 PM IST.
The 1st T20I between Australia and West Indies will be played at Bellerive Oval in Hobart.
